title: Senior Software Engineer, Endpoint Security
summary: Imagine what you could do here. Do you want to make an impact on the global security landscape? Join us at Apple to develop cutting-edge services to identify and mitigate security risks.
description: We build and operate advanced telemetry, detection, and response software tools to secure and protect Apple’s networks. As part of the software team, you will partner with teams across Apple to prioritize and build the product roadmap, advocate for your solutions and secure buy-in, continue to research, drive, and develop solutions, and ensure accuracy and timeliness of telemetry, detection, and response actions.
preferred_qualifications: Experience working on observability technology such as eBPF, experience with open source endpoint security tools, expertise with building and using log aggregation and distributed monitoring tools, experience with application tracing, monitoring, analysis, and visualizations through analytics dashboards, excellent interpersonal skills, experience using and releasing open source software in corporate environments.
additional_requirements: This posting is not for a specific job opening. By submitting your resume, you express interest in being contacted about this type of role at Apple in the future.
